comment: In a ` K `-regular graph, the size of the set ` A ` of walks of length ` N ` starting with a fixed vertex ` X ` and ending not at this vertex is the difference between ` K ` to the power of ` N ` and the size of the set ` B ` of closed walks of length ` N ` anchored at this vertex ` X ` .
